title: These Bees
description: What will happen to a group of bees when their home is cut down? Where will they go? In These Bees, students will join the bees in their search for a new home. Colorful illustrations and a repetitive text structure support early emergent readers. This story will help students learn how to identify problem and solution as well as the proper use of periods.
meta: birdhouse, bus stop, home, log, mailbox, need
Connect to prior knowledge to understand text
Problem and Solution : Determine problem and solution
Rhyme : Identify and produce rhyming words
Periods : Recognize and use periods correctly in sentences
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word good

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
